name: Shanika Ogburn
text: I used this company yesterday for my daughter's birthday party and the kids loved it! Their set up was efficient and professional. The deliverers were friendly and professional and talked us through the whole set up. We didn't have any issues with the inflatable water slide. It was clean and in great condition when delivered. I would definitely recommend this company to others.

name: Mimis Webkinzs
text: Rented the tropical slide for the 4th of July. Wonderful experience and very professional! Will be using this company again in the future !

name: Ashley Cole
text: Great Honest and professional folks. Not to mention they'll go above and beyond for their customers.

name: Sarah Roth
text: Cannot say enough good things about this company and the people working there! We had a last minute cancellation on an inflatable from another company (due to their policy regarding weather - no fault of theirs, we knew the risk) but Summer Fun saved my daughters birthday party and got us a rental that all the kiddos LOVED ! We called on Friday and they had it set up for us early on Saturday. The entire experience was great, the people who set and broke down were so sweet and considerate. Really cant rave enough about them - THANK YOU SUMMER FUN! :)

name: Amanda Pickett
text: Their AWESOME! Very nice people. The bounces are nice an clean.

name: Jen Carpenter
text: Mike and Misty are incredible!! I worked with them and their team for over 10 years. I hired them several times for multiple events over our history together.  We did events for 20 and events for 2000. They are able to locate any special request items (even finding me a professional karaoke machine so I wouldn’t have to rent one from them as often. They are the absolute best. Highly recommend. 10/10.

name: Chelsia Strain
text: I used them for my daughters first birthday party. Got a big misting fan. I was suppose to pick it up the night before. They over booked it so they offered to bring it to me the next day. I didn't make it to my house until noon which was okay the party wasn't until later then they cane back and picmed it up four hours later. I paid for an all day rental. They are nice people just a little disappointed in how the events turned out. I will probably use them again so they can redeem the loss.

name: Rick Blaine
text: I have used them for my kids birthday parties, everything from big slides to concessions.  Staff was always very professional and had everything up and running before our actual start time.  Will definitely keep using them.  Wonderful job !!!

name: Elizabeth Strong
text: We had the most fun! The inflatables were set up super early and the guys were professional and polite. Loved our experience!

name: Dylan Westbrook
text: Awesome service, willing to work around scheduling, new and clean products

name: robyn rawls
text: they were professional. arrived early, and gave us extra time at no charge... I will be using them again this summer!

name: Deborah Smith
text: Great company super delivery and pickup!! Fabulous water slide my grandchildren loved it and will definitely rent again!!

name: ashley morgan
text: I highly recommend Spartan Inflatables. We have used other companies before, but working with Spartan was so much easier than the companies that we have used prior.  Everyone was so nice and set up and take down was quick and efficient.

name: TaRA miller
text: Delivery was a breeze.  My child loved the experience.  Everything was setup and secure. No need to worry about anything! It is always perfect!

name: Brett Crump
text: Professional and friendly staff. All the kids enjoyed the inflatable we rented for a birthday party.

name: Tyler Myers
text: Not only did they bring the slide early, they came and picked it up later the next afternoon. I'm sure this was because of the busy Memorial Day weekend, but it definitely added to the fun the slide brought to my birthday part. 10/10 would rent from them again.

name: ANA ROBERTS
text: very nice customer service, on time and we enjoyed the 25' wet slide.

name: Carayann Sharpe
text: Best customer service and reasonably priced.

name: Zac Lambrecht
text: Team was professional and on time for delivery and pick up. Would highly recommend them to friends.

name: Sue Sells
text: Awesome, friendly business! We enjoyed the water slide ... made a lot of memories! We’ll definitely be seeing you guys again!!

name: Frank Gregory
text: We had an excellent experience renting our water slide from Spartan Inflatables. The price was reasonable. The arrangements for delivery and pickup were timely and well communicated. The delivery guys were friendly, showed up on time, and tested everything before leaving. And the slide was a big hit with all the kids... big and small :)

resp.text: Thank you Frank for the kind words! Glad everyone enjoyed the water slide. Look forward to working with you again!

name: Gayle Dearman
text: Super friendly delivery & set-up staff made Spartan a pleasure to do business with. The water-slide I rented was extremely clean, which I was very appreciative of. I'll definitely do business with Spartan again.

name: Brandon Kilpatrick
text: From researching, they had the largest slide in Mobile area. The guys who delivered it where professional and explained everything well. Will definitely do business with Spartan again.

name: Mike
text: I rented the 19' slide for a few days and loved it, the people at Spartan Inflatables were very helpful in picking which slide would fit best in our strange shaped yard. We are having a blast with it and will definitely use them again.

name: Tiffany Gibbs
text: Great experience!  Very easy communication, set up was on time and quick.  Inflatables were secure and held up to 400 students with no issues.  Prices were reasonable.

name: Ashlyn Drinkard
text: The water slide was very clean and almost brand new! The staff were super friendly and made set up very easy! Will use again next year!

name: Rachael DeBruin
text: Great customer service! A pleasure to work with, would definitely use them again!

name: Jessica Agerton
text: Excellent customer service. Rental was new and extremely clean. Communication was excellent throughout the whole process. I would definitely recommend and use Spartan Inflatables again.

name: Erin Holmes
text: We had a great experience using Spartan Inflatables.  They arrived early, positioned our inflatables accurately, and made sure everything was working properly before leaving.  They were both professional, friendly, and easy to work with.  We will definitely be using them again!

name: Kasey Aucoin
text: Fast response, friendly service, and prompt delivery. Very professional. We will definitely use them again!

name: Laurel Flowers
text: Such an easy process. They went above and beyond to make our mermaid birthday party special and go off without a hitch!

name: jaxson
text: Great people! Went out of their way to to make us have a good experience.

name: Amanda Street
text: Very friendly service! I will definitely be a returning customer!

name: Annaleigh Nowling
text: I had a great experience with Spartan Inflatables and can't wait to use them again!

name: Melissa Brooks
text: Great product and service.  Will defiantly use again.

name: Kevin Silloway
text: Excellent job couldnt ask for a better experience I recommend them and willbe using them again

name: Dameon Norris
text: Awesome customer service, clean and well maintained inflatables, very professional!!  Well use with my next event!

name: Helmut Geissler
text: nice service

name: Jerry cotney jr
text: The owner of this business is so genuine. I was so glad the business not only survived the pandemic, but seems to be thriving more than before. They are very friendly, the inflatable was clean, and we had a great time. Keep up the good work!

name: Allyson Brimer
text: I had an amazing experience with this company! The pick up and drop off was seamless. Even though our interactions were brief, I could tell that these people are very kind and hard working. The bounce houses are sanitized during the week and that made me feel more confident renting it. I highly recommend them!

name: Empress Aiicha
text: Nothing I LOVE more than to book online and pick up without a hitch! I was excited to be able to book this company online and not have to call. Everything was explained well and pick up was so easy! The owner has a great personality and I will use and recommend them again!

name: Alyssa McKoy
text: This was a great addition to our party! Everyone loved it! Pick up and drop off was very simple! Easy to find. All employees were super friendly! Will for sure recommend to anyone looking for an inflatable and will use again in the future!

name: Johnny McDonough
text: rented a wet slide for family reunion with a dozen or so school aged . They had time of their life playing and sliding. Best prices . I loved that I got it on Saturday morning early and didn't have to rush getting it returned until Monday morning. Great group to rent from. Will I use them again ? Yes , without any second thought. Thank you "Pick Up Your Party" from my entire family.

resp.text: Thank you, Johnny for  the five star review. We are glad your reunion  went well. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Kelsey Kendrick
text: Great experience! My kids got sick the day before their party and I had to reschedule everything. They were super nice and understanding and worked with me without hesitation. The pick up and drop off process was extremely easy! Will def use them again!

name: Amanda Bales
text: We rented a combo bounce house/slide for my son's birthday. The company communicated well through email/text leading up to the event. Everything went very smoothly with pick up and staff was very friendly. It's really great to be able to keep it for the whole weekend and the price made it more worth it that way. We were wondering how hard it would be to set up. It took some effort but doable for me and my husband and really not bad at all. Rolling it back up and loading in the truck we needed a third person helping.

name: Ms. Lee-Carter
text: Quick and easy booking with reasonable prices. Early pick up and drop off!!! Will be booking again and hopefully will have a day with lighter rain showers or none at all to really enjoy the inflatable. #SupportBlkOwnBiz

name: Valeria Hatley
text:
Picking it out, placing the order, paying and drop off was super easy. We will continue to use them in future.. but when we got home with the combo bounce house and water slide, it was a muddy mess on the inside.. Not sure if it was overlooked when cleaning after someone else returned it or what.. We had to clean the inside out before the kids played in it.. that is the only reason I gave them 3 stars..
We have used them twice in the past week and a half.. Like I said previously, we will be using them again.!! Super nice.!!

name: T Lawley
text: I arrived 20-30 minutes early to pick up the rental and was expecting to wait until 8:00 but to my surprise there were already several guys  working and loading rentals into vehicles. I didn’t have to get out of the car at all and the employees loaded everything we needed. The entire process was super easy and the guys working were very friendly. I will continue to use them when we rent in the future and recommend you do the same!

name: Michelle McAnnally
text: I rented a wet/dry slide for my daughter’s birthday this past weekend and it was great!!! The pick up and drop off process went smoothly, they have it down to a science!!! I would highly recommend this company for all your party rental needs!!!

name: Erin Vogt
text: We rented the Jolly Jump for my three-year old’s birthday, and it was perfect! The kids had so much fun and after naptime, we jumped more. It’s a great deal, especially for having it the entire weekend. Set up tear down was honestly super easy, as was the pick up and drop off process. For larger units, definitely have a couple people ready to help lift, but this one was small enough my husband could handle it on his own.

name: Ryan Crowley
text: No doubt the folks at 205Party rentals deserve 5/5 stars! Picking up  and dropping off was straight forward and all of their employees were extremely friendly and helpful! Great experience, worth the drive from Calera!

name: Megan A
text: Ordering online was super easy and convenient. Pick up and drop off was a breeze and all the kids enjoyed the bounce house with two water slides! Definitely will use them for our next party.

name: Maggie & Vinny Ciccazzo
text: We had a great experience with this company! Communication and instructions were excellent! The bounce slide was in great condition and we loved having it the whole weekend!

name: Kimberly Gregory
text: We rented a bouncy house/slide combo this weekend and the kids loved it! Easy to book online and easy pick up and drop off! We will be using them again we had a great experience!

name: Jennifer Cook
text: The staff are so friendly and amazing!!  They do not mind answering questions.  The entire experience from the online booking, pick up, and return is simple.  They really make it easy to get the items that you need and take the stress out of planning any event!!

name: Jennifer Lawley
text: We have used them several times and it’s always a nice experience! Most recently rented the combo with bounce house and two slides and it was the most fun my kids have ever had on an inflatable! Would highly recommend!

name: Lahni Crum
text: Amazing family owned business. Wonderful customer service, very pleasant and helpful through out rental process. Float was very easy to set up and deflate (you will need some help) lol but the kids loved it, kept it all weekend and the the owners were absolutely amazing from beginning to end. Please do rent from 205 party rental they are the best around town, you WILL be satisfied and get our monies worth!

name: Kibbe Jones
text: Excellent to work with. Up front with all info and ran smoothly. Slide was in perfect condition and clean.

name: QG Hair
text: Ordered two sets of chairs from them. They were scratched up but got the job done. If I’d known I would have bought covers for the chairs. Love the fact I didn’t have to rush my event because we had everything from Sat to Mon. Nice employees. Will order again!

name: KingofAlec
text: As described and then some. Super easy to rent, pick up, and return. Everyone was nice and helpful, couldn’t recommend them more!

name: Rachel Boling-Johnson
text: From what I can tell this is a family owned business.  They were AMAZING! Very friendly and polite.  It was obvious they took pride in what they were doing and customer satisfaction. When they say every unit is sanitized between uses they are not lying.  I pulled up and the bouncy houses were being cleaned and sanitized and wiped down.  Best experience will definitely be using them again!!

resp.text:
Thank you, Mrs. Boling-Johnson. We appreciate  your business.
God Bless you!

name: Courtney Bates
text: Super easy and great price. Family owned. Will be using again!!

name: KIMBERLY Williams
text: My kids enjoyed the water slide and we will definitely be renting again and soon!!!

name: Roxanne Stephenson
text: Excellent customer service and great pricing! Why would you want to go anywhere else?! At this point I don’t even look for deals, because I know they are the BEST!

name: Bradley Quick
text: Great service and price. Overall great experience.

name: Erin Swenson
text: The bounce house with slide was a hit! The kids loved it, great customer service. Will definitely use again!

name: ashley Hulsey
text: I got the all star combo bounce house this weekend for my daughters 2nd birthday, everyone loved it! Pick up your party has wonderful staff, super friendly and helpful. Super easy to go pick up from them but yall really need a few men to get it  off the truck and set up, this bounce house was heavy to move around, again overall amazing experience and its affordable to do! Most definitely getting another bounce houuse in a few months for my 10 year olds bday

name: AUBURNAZD '01 and '03
text: We have rented from them 3 times and every time has gone perfectly!!! They are good people and were very accommodating!

name: R Love
text: This business is flat out the best. Wonderful people and service. I will be renting here again for our next party.

name: C. Diane Kyles
text: Will definitely be using them again, great prices,  great deals.

name: Paige Ross
text: Great product.  Friendly. Kids had a blast!

name: Erica Pannell
text: Great Prices, easy booking online, and a great selection!

name: Alyssa McMaster
text: Had no issues & awesome customer service!

name: Sandy Peoples
text: Would definitely recommend! Very friendly people and great prices!

name: LaTrese Duncan
text: The fact that I was able to keep the bounce house the entire weekend for the same price as a one day rental. I will definitely be using you again and I will recommend you as well. Location is not actually in Trussville as the website says, warehouse is located in Argo city limits. The owners were nice, friendly and provided fast loading service IN AND OUT!! The one thing I would like to see added to the service is delivery.

resp.text: Thank you,Mrs. Ducan for  the review. We appreciate  your business.

name: Shalonda Rodgers
text: Great company! The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The offer great deals and prices on their rentals. I’ve rented from them several times and have never had any issues.

resp.text: Thank you, Mrs. Rodgers for  the five star wonderful review. We aim to please. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Taylor Swilley
text: They were extremely personable, respectful, and it was so easy!! I drove up, they loaded...came back & they unloaded! Great costumer service. 10/10 recommend them for extra fun for your special event. 😃

resp.text: Thank you, Taylor for taking the time to fill out a review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Unique Unique
text:
This was by far the most self efficient experience I've ever had everything went smoothly.  Due to the fact that we have  our own business; time is not available; having the opportunity to do everything online and pick- up Drive-through style was truly amazing !!!
All information provided all while sitting in the car.

Thank you 😊

resp.text: Thank you, Unique for  the five star review. Thank you for the compliment. We worked hard trying to figure out what works. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Jessica Causey
text: We rented the Justice League bounce house for my sons 3rd birthday. It was bigger than I expected (which is great with a ton of toddlers) and the kids LOVED it. I nearly had to drag them out long enough to do cake and presents. The pick up process was very easy. They are ready when you get there. No hassle at all. I will definitely be renting from them again! I will also splurge and get a combination inflatable. It’s totally worth every dime.

resp.text: THANK YOU! Mrs. Causey for the five star review. We are glad you enjoyed the justice league. Please come again!

name: Michael Jeely
text: You can’t go wrong with Pick Up Your Party rentals! I’ve been using them for several years and have always been more than satisfied with the prices, the equipment, and the convenience. I use their equipment for every one of my kids birthdays and it’s always been a hit with the kids and parents. The staff is extremely nice and helpful with loading and easy to work with if you run a little behind on the drop off time. Try them out and just like me you’ll be back again and again!

name: Erica James
text: Love the weekend deals cany beat it with a stick!!!

name: Valerie Jones
text: Reasonable prices. Very friendly employees very organized system in picking up your product. I will rent again

resp.text:
Thank you, Mrs. Jones, We
Appreciate  you. GOD BLESS YOU!

name: Christo Borsellino
text: Very friendly people, they will load your vehicle and explain how to setup which is easy. Pick it up around 8-9 am Saturday and you have until Monday morning at 9am to return it. Good experience good people. We always rent from them when we have a kids party.

resp.text: Thank you, Christo for taking the time to fill out a review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Tracey Rucks
text: We rented 2 bouncy houses for a family party. They were easy to pick up and return and price was great. We will rent again!

resp.text: Thank you, Mrs. Rucks for the wonderful  review.  GOD bless you!

name: Laquita White
text: Very professional! Extremely nice. My son lost his AirPod in the bouncy house and I received a phone call immediately. Will definitely be supporting this business again.

resp.text: Thank you, Mrs.  White for  the five star review. Those things are expensive.lol.We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Jeramy Murphree
text: We had an issue with the blower not working with the unit we rented. Within an hour of discovering the problem we had a new blower and were good to go. Great customer service! I’d recommend them to anyone and we’ll use them again too!

resp.text: Thank you, Jeramy for  the five star review. We are glad to get the problem resolve. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: T'Derek Luster
text: The absolute best! Very professional, friendly, and they have a best friend vibe about them. You can tell that they care about their customers. I will definitely be back SEVERAL times...

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Luster for  the five star review. We appreciate  the compliments. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Katlynn Mintz
text: Easy pick up & drop off, set up & take down is also fairly easy! Friendly faces & great customer service! 10/10 recommend, we will definitely rent from here for all of our future parties!!

resp.text: Thank you, Katlynn for  the five star review. Thank for inform how easy the process is. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Joia Saunders
text: I have used this company several times over the past few years and each time I've recieved clean bouncy houses in great conditions. Pick up and drop off is simple, the website is easy to navigate, and they have some of the lowest pricing available in the city as well. I will continue to use them until my kids stop wanting bounce houses for parties lol!

resp.text: Thank you, Joia for  the five star review. We appreciate  your business.We hope to serve you even more in the future. God bless!

name: Richard Armstrong
text: I have rented equipment from 205Party Rentals for two different Birthday Parties. The equipment has alaways been very good quality and very clean. The staff has always been very pleasant to deal with and very helpful. I highly recommend 205Party Rentals!

resp.text: Thank you, Mr..Armstrong for  the five star review. Glad to serve you.Thanks for the wonderful review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Rachael Layfield
text: Amazing, easy experience! Everything was smooth from booking to pick up to drop off! The mega princess castle was perfect for my daughter's birthday! Loved having the bouncy house all weekend too instead of just a few hours! Will be using Pick Up Your Party again!

resp.text:
Thank you, Mrs. Layfield. We strive to make the experience  as pleasant
as possible.  Thank you so much for your business!

name: Cedric Mcnabb
text: This is great company. Great customer service. I will use them again and I recommend them to everyone!

resp.text: Thank you, Cedric for  the five star review. We hope to continue to serve you in the future. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Sheri Powers
text: Very friendly and accommodating! Pick up was easy. The wet/dry bounce slide combo was such a blast! Will use again and refer to other people

name: Moeisha Jones
text: The lady on the phone seems very nice the only thing I have a problem with is the non-refundable policy that you put all the way at the bottom instead of the top. I recently cancelled a bouncy house way before the two day cancellation period. If you going to do a non-refundable policy make a deposit to reserve which would be more understandable then not refunding the full amount someone is paying. To be honest that's scamming and the good rain check a year from the original date is most definitely a scam. If I decide to get a bouncy house you guys will literally be the last option. The only reason you have two stars from me is because of the nice and respectful lady that answered the phone.

resp.text: Mrs Jones, All payments are non-refundable like it says on our website, and in your order confirmation email, and in the form you completed when you placed your order right before you entered your card information. You have a raincheck that allows 365 days to reschedule.

name: Jasmine Talsma
text: They are reasonably priced bounce houses and it’s great that you get to keep it all weekend. I do wish they had more drop off times on Sunday. As of now, the only time you can drop off the bounce house you rent is Sunday at 3 pm or Monday at 8 am. The inflatables are in excellent condition and they do sanitize them between use.

resp.text: Thank you, For your awesome review. We will consider different  times  as we pass this pandemic!

name: Sean Swain
text: Easy to get and was able to work around a schedule issue.  Fast, friendly and my kids loved it.

resp.text: Thank you, Sean for taking the time to fill out a review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Wendy Nesmith
text: Top notch company to work with! Pick up and drop off couldn't be any easier and it was so nice to keep the slide for 2 days. Will definitely use again!

resp.text:
Thank you, Mrs. Nesmith
For the beautiful  review, we striving get better and better. Thank you!

name: Stephanie Martin
text: This was my second year to rent from Pick Up Your Party and they again did not disappoint! We have so much fun with their inflatables and look forward to using them again next year. We already have our eyes on the one we want to rent. Thank y’all for your service, we look forward to seeing y’all again!

name: Tanisha Rose
text: Affordable price especially for the whole weekend. The kids enjoyed the water slide. Will be renting from them again

resp.text: Thank you, Tanisha for  the five star review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Tiara Daniel
text: This was my first time renting from them for my sons first birthday. Everything was great . They had so many selections to choose from . It was a simple , quick and easy process for everything!

resp.text: Thank you, Tiara for  the five star review. We are glad your son's birthday  was a success. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: thatboygabee
text: Very great experience overall. fast and easy pick up , as well as drop off. Very friendly staff! Will be renting from here again!

resp.text: Thank you,  Thatboygabee for  the five star review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Tijuana Haynes
text: Although it was a minor mix up with my order, I really really enjoyed the rental experience that Pick Up Your Party and will definitely return...ps..the kids enjoyed the bounce house.

resp.text: Thank you, Tijuana for  the five star review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: mike foreman
text: This is my second time renting with them and it’s a super easy experience. Both times were water slides. Great for “stay at home party”  would absolutely rent again.  Pick up took 5 minutes and it took longer than the drop off.

resp.text: Thank you! Mr. Foreman for the five star review. We are glad to be at service. Please! Come again.

name: Whitley Holt
text: They were fast and friendly, good prices and good equipment. My only issue was the time frame for pickup/drop is very early in the morning between 8-9. Although that is way to early in the morning for me, I will likely rent from them again in the future and highly recommend them.

resp.text: THANK YOU! Mrs. Holt for the five star review. We appreciate  your honest review. Please come again!

name: Kim Hobbs
text: Great experience!  Highly recommend bringing a truck to pick up and drop off.  Everyone was super nice and so helpful!  👍 10 out of 10 will do it again!

resp.text: THANK YOU! Mrs.Hobbs , We try our best to give as much information  as possible.  Thank you for reinforcing  that. I am glad you enjoyed.  Looking forward to your future  business.

name: Cameron Medders
text: Very nice and clean. Easy pick up, just drive up and they load it in. Paperwork can be done online so all you have to have is your ID ready to show. Dont even have to get out or do anything!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review.  You have expressed everything that may wife and I wanted people to know. Please, come again  Mr. Medders.

name: Ebony Peak
text: Product was awesome! My son enjoyed the slide I even took a slide myself. Communication and professionalism was awesome.

name: Andrew Poe
text: Great value.  They charge for the weekend what most charged for 6 hours.  As long as you have some friends to help with set up and take down.

resp.text: Thank you for your wonderful  review. We really appreciate  your business Mr. Poe!

name: Tracie Monson
text: Owners are great & easy to do business. We rented the Turbo Thriller for our 10 year old’s birthday. Kids absolutely loved it! Highly recommend for your next summer party!

resp.text: THANK YOU! Mrs. Monson Iam glad we where able to help make you son birthday  so special. Please come again!

name: Eric Snuggs
text: Very efficient and friendly staff. I will definitely use again.

resp.text: Thank you, Eric for  the five star review. Thank you for the wonderful review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Lilla Brasher
text: Great prices and easy to work with

name: stacey H
text: Wonderful experience! Waterslide was perfect for our party and would recommend to anyone looking to rent.

name: Brian Monson
text: Awesome Customer Service! Best Selection In the Birmingham Area.

name: Adventures with Jude
text: Fantastic customer service! Would highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you, Jude for  the five star review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Misty Burt
text: Great deal and loads of fun for the whole weekend!! Definitely will be ordering from them again!

resp.text: Thank you, Mrs. Burt, we appreciate  your wonder review. Looking forward  to servicing you again.

name: Shirley Gray
text: Very convenient and professional buisness. The owners seem to be a nice christian couple who really tries to satisfy their customers.

resp.text: Thank You!  Mrs. Gray. GOD Bless you! Please, come again!!!!

name: Shaquana White
text: The guys were very accommodating, professional, approachable, outgoing, friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. I guess that is why they have been in business over 16 years. I would recommend them for everyone who could use  their service for your parties to come. We witnessed them cleaning up the bouncy houses  after people brought back each unit. they even  went as far as vacuuming out my rental car after removal of the bouncy house. Great folks and services.

name: Lyza Tucker
text: This place is Awesome. We rented the cannonball run water slide last weekend for our sons birthdays. They had a blast and loved the slide. Great customer service. I picked the slide up and dropped it off with myself and the kids. The guys where really nice they loaded and unloaded it for me. This was our 2nd time renting from them and we will definitely be back. We rented the slide Friday morning and returned it Monday morning with the weekend deal. I will definitely recommend this place to anyone looking. Thank you guys so much.

name: Anna Owens
text: This will be my forever go to for inflatables.  Great quality, great price and all weekend rental. The owners and employees are very helpful and professional.  Turnaround time is very fast if you need help or leave a message. Highly recommend!

name: Trianika Woodard
text:
The company was great everything was on point great communication
great organizations
The only things was the location  it's not actually in trussville

name: Brittni Mills
text: The process is so easy and our kids had the best time in a bounce house on their birthday weekend!

resp.text: THANK YOU! Mrs. Palmore for the five star review.  I am glad you enjoyed your bounce house. Please come again!

name: Mary Beth Epperson
text: This was the second year in a row that we have used a bounce house from Pick Up Your Party. The booking is easy and they have great communication. We had to change our pick up date and they were very accommodating and helpful. I'd definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you, Epperson. It was our pleasure.  Please, come again!

name: Amanda Jordan
text: Great customer service-easy booking, pick up and return.

resp.text:
Thank you, Mrs. Jordan for the wonderful  review. We really appreciate  the five star review. Thank you!!!!
GOD BLESS YOU!

name: queen Z
text: The kids loved the slide and had an amazing time. Enjoyed the experience

resp.text: Thank you! Ms. Queen for the five star review. We are glad you had a goodtime.

name: Lola Reese
text: I love it! Will be doing more business with y’all

name: Lorino Smith
text: I people was very friendly and professional. I would recommend everyone use them for all their party needs.

name: Gramata Shorter
text: Great Staff and Great Price.

resp.text: Thank you, Gramata for  the five star review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Rudy Rudulph
text: These guys were great.  They helped me put together a great birthday party for my 4 year old.  Look forward to working with them again in the future.

resp.text: THANK YOU! Mr. Rudolph for the five star review. We appreciate  the opportunity. Please come again!

name: Keia C
text: They were great. Everything was good. They explained how to operate the equipment properly. They really work with you. Will definitely be back for bounce houses.

resp.text: THANK YOU! Mrs. Keia, We appreciate your very informative review. Please come again!

name: Nona S.
text:
Great experience! I needed about 40 tables and chairs at the last minute on a holiday weekend for my daughters event, and from start to finish, this company and its staff were very hands-on & helpful. Immediately, the Owners were very kind, yet
professional, & thoughtful in assisting us throughout the entire rental process. So, If u are one who can pickup and setup your own rentals, I would definitely recommend this company!

name: Ashley Hudson
text: My experience was awesome ! We will be booking again very soon!

name: Ashley Dark
text: Great service! Great prices! I was very pleased with my rental! The staff was very friendly and professional. I would definitely recommend and I will also be doing business with them again! Thanks so much!

name: Kaitlin Ezekiel
text: I had a fantastic experience! Pick up was so easy. They loaded it right up for me and setting it up at my house was a lot easier than I thought it would be! We got a moon walk for my sons birthday and it was very enjoyable! Taking it down and returning it was just as easy. They unloaded it for me and we were on our way. Great products and AMAZING customer service. I would strongly recommend this company and I will definitely be using them again!

name: Tee w
text: My twins enjoyed they 3rd bday party with the 2 bouncy houses we rented they enjoyed the weekend thanks again

resp.text: THANK YOU! Mrs. Tee for the pleasure helping with your twins birthday. Please come again!

name: Megan Harris
text: Great customer service and the equipment has no issues...

name: Heather Walker
text: We rented a jumpy house for my sons 2nd birthday. All the kids had a blast playing on it. And the best part we got to keep it for the whole weekend. The birthday boy was able to enjoy it for three days instead of the typical one day or hourly rental. The staff was very nice. We will definitely be renting again.

name: Marquita Laister
text: I have rented from this company for several years now and it is great. I’ve had a delay or two but they always accommodate for them. I’ll continue to rent from them. The customer service is great.

name: Heather Walker
text: We rented a jumpy house for my sons 2nd birthday. All the kids had a blast playing on it. And the best part we got to keep it for the whole weekend. The birthday boy was able to enjoy it for three days instead of the typical one day or hourly rental. The staff was very nice. We will definitely be renting again.

name: Britte Hardy
text: Mr. John & Mrs. Quin are awesome. They are so kind and helpful. The website was user friendly and I could contact them with any needs or questions and received an answer promptly. My family just enjoyed all that we rented from them. The prices are excellent and to be able to rent for days was the best. Easy set up and take down. We will be renting from them frequently.

name: Cassandra Rodgers
text: The moonwalk was a hit at my son's party. The price is unbeatable! We had the moonwalk for the weekend,and paid less than what people pay for a few hours. The moonwalk was very clean, and easy to set up and break down. I will definitely be using this company in the future. The owners were also very friendly.

name: Brittany Freeman
text: We got the indoor:outdoor bounce house for my twins birthday. We sent a family member to pick it up and they said it was easy and they had no trouble! The house was in great condition and the kids had a blast. It was super easy to set up and take down. Return was great too! So glad I took a chance on this business!

name: Kristen Boutwell
text: I’ve used this company for my kids’ parties for almost 7 years. They are WONDERFUL. Such great customer service, clean and reliable bounce houses and very reasonably priced. I don’t know of another company that would let you keep a bounce house from Fri-Mon! My kids and all the neighborhood kids bounce all weekend and have such a blast. I would highly recommend them to anyone!!! Thank y’all for such a wonderful renting experience! We will definitely continue to come back!

name: Aimee Barnes
text:
I ordered again for my son's birthday. The Jump House was HUGE and a Blast. Picking up Saturday and dropping off Monday morning was an easy process. Having an extra day was worth the drive. (And I hear they're adding a second location!)
Easy ordering - Great Service. Well maintained product!

name: Hottblnde
text: Wonderful service. John is wonderful!! Great prices. It was a blessing to find this place and have Fri to Mon to enjoy a water slide for such an amazing price. Thank you. Will be using you again in the future!

name: Neal Fondren
text: Nice folks to deal with.

resp.text: Thank you, Neal for taking the time to fill out a review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: reggie moss
text: Excellent services 👍🏾

resp.text: Thank you, Reggie for  the five star review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Zachary Paul
text: I’ve rented chairs from these guys several times. Their prices can’t be beat (and I’ve certainly looked)! They’re friendly, quick, and professional. There was even a small issue of being shorted one chair but they quickly rectified the situation without even being asked. I highly recommend Pick Up Your Party!

name: angela christenson
text: These guys were the most efficient, organized and affordable, of any place I have ever used for my granddaughters birthdays. They definitely have my business for all future birthdays!

name: reggie moss
text: Excellent services 👍🏾

resp.text: Thank you, Reggie for  the five star review. We appreciate  your business. God bless!

name: Ann Wallace
text: This is the second time to rent from this company, these inflatables are very clean, high quality, a great value, and our grandchildren love them!

resp.text: THANK YOU! Mrs. Wallace for the five star review. We really love your review. We will continue to serve you in the future. Please come again!

name: Jennifer Netherland
text: Friendly staff! Great deal! Had it from 9 on Friday morning ,until 9 Monday morning! Definitely got our money's worth!!

name: Nick Roof
text: Would definitely use again! Kids loved superhero blowup!

resp.text: THANK YOU! Mrs. Roof for the five star review. The superhero definitely  a treat. Please come again!

name: Purvis Deramus
text: Outstanding service will definitely use them again. Great pricing and easy to setup.

name: Nicole Crespo
text: Great prices and great customer service!!  Will definitely use again!!

name: Natasha Moore
text: I would definitely recommend! They made this process easy and convenient. And the equipment was CLEAN.

name: Arielle Hands
text: I used this company for my son's 4th Birthday Party. They were extremely professional and flexible. The price was unbelievable! I rented a moon bounce and two children's picnic tables for the ENTIRE WEEKEND for less than what I paid for just a bouncy house last year for just the day of the party using another company. The equipment was clean and in great condition. They even provided a party planning checklist that helped me out a lot! I really appreciated the way they worked with me to make my baby's party a success. I plan to use them here in Huntsville again and highly recommend them to anyone in the area or any of the areas they service! Thanks again 😁

name: Lori Hardin
text: We enjoyed our experience with pick up your party in Trussville. Super friendly staff, and the kiddos had an absolute blast for my baby girls 5th Birthday in the princess bounce house. It was super easy to set up and bring back. They load and unload the equipment for you.

name: Erin Wondrow
text: Very nice guy, easy to pick up and drop off. Explained all the steps to set up and take down. The best price in the Birmingham area! Will use again and recommend to everyone!

name: Valerie Tyler
text: I rented  large bounce house for my kid’s birthday party. We picked it up Friday morning and returned it Monday morning. The kids loved it so much and didn’t want to return it lol The staff is very friendly and their prices are very reasonable. We loved being able to keep it for the full weekend! I was nervous about having to set up and break down the moonwalk at first - but the employee I spoke with when picking it up explained it very well and I had no trouble. I will definitely be using them again in the future for other parties and will recommend them to anyone!!!

name: Albernetta Johnson
text: My first time using them it was for my daughters first birthday party. The kids loved the inflatables and they were very easy to set up. Great customer service very friendly. I will definitely use them in the future!

name: Lance Cisco
text: Great place to rent an inflatable. Very nice folks to work with and reasonable prices! My kids loved being able to play on the moonwalk all weekend! We will for sure be customers here again!

name: Kevin Lamb
text: I was very pleased with the service friendly people and everything was very easy to do my self thank you so much and you will get my service again my kids loved the Rainbow slip and slide

name: Jeff Green
text: These guys are the best. We have rented from them 4 times now. They have great bounce houses and great customer service. They are very efficient at dropping off and picking up their bounce houses. It's so easy and worry free.  I have referred them to several people and they have had zero complaints.

name: Kimberly Whitehurst
text: We have used this company twice now for water slides and love them.  My kids get to use the slide all weekend for the price of a few hours.  So worth it.  The slides are also very simple to set up.

name: christy defoor
text: Super friendly service . Easy pick up and drop. My kiddos loved being able to have it all weekend and it was a great price.

name: Kristin Heard
text: This was my first time using 205Party. The owner was very friendly. I ordered the Candyland bounce house for my daughters 1st birthday. Pick up, set up and returning was very easy. There wasn't a rush for us to return it. We got it on Friday and returned it back on Sunday evening. I would definitely use this company again and recommend it to others.

name: Ashleigh Brook
text: I have rented from them several times now. I always get quality equipment. The bounce house was easy to pick up and inflate. I love that you can keep the equipment all weekend, worth every penny!

name: Arrelia Smith
text: We were able to book the bounce house we rented way in advance and keep it the whole weekend our little girl loved it and so did the other children that were at her party. I very highly recommend them!

name: Angel Corns
text: We ordered the princess jump for our daughters 4th birthday party. Easy pick up in Pelham. Easy to put together and take down. We had a wonderful experience. Can't wait to do a water slide for my other daughters birthday this summer. Definitely recommend using them. The gentleman that helped me at pick up and drop off was very nice and explained everything very well!

name: Gena Childers
text: Great first time bounce house rental!  Picked up on Friday morning and returned Sunday afternoon.  Easy to setup and take down (my husband handled this part).  Successful 4-year-old birthday party!

name: Summer Latty
text: LOVED THEM!!! I rented one of the big combo bouncy house with a slide and my kids had so much fun. Picked it up Friday morning and returned it Sunday evening. We had a party that Saturday and all the kids enjoyed it. My 4 year old didn't want to pack it up and return it..lol she said let's keep it forever.  Needless to say I will use them again and I would recommend them in a heartbeat .

name: adam 5star
text: Always a good experience!

resp.text: Thank you!! Mr. Adam, we appreciate  your business!!!!

name: Martin Posey
text: Great Place to rent your party needs.  Staff is very nice, returns are super easy and prices are very affordable.  Will definitely rent from them again for my next event.

name: Jada Hicks
text: Everything was quick and easy. This is my second time placing a order both times I had a great experience, people were very professional and kind.

name: Melissa Maddox
text: We had a wonderful experience renting from PUYP! The pickup and dropoff was quick and easy and the staff was very helpful and informative. The bounce house was huge, clean and so fun. We will be renting again for our next birthday party!!!! Thank you for helping make our kids day extra fun!

name: Corey Barron
text: Very nice and easy to work with! And very affordable!

name: Clarissa Shelnutt
text: The owners are so sweet and nice. The prices are amazing. I rented the paradise pludge for my daughter's birthday. I got the slide for the whole weekend. They gave me thier cell number if I had any question. Set up, pick up and drop off  was easy. We will go to them for now on.

name: Kelsey Hall
text: We love 205 party rentals. Best prices in town, courteous and professional. Great service!!!

name: Ericka Harden
text: Great value for short notice need of an inflatable for a birthday party. Would recommend this company if you have any need for an inflatable or other items for social events.

name: LAVSHA KING
text: Great customer service!! The staff greeted me and soon as I step out of the truck! They load and u loaded the bounce. I will be renting from them again!!

name: Amanda Martin
text: Good prices and great service. It was really easy to pick these up and they were really easy to set up with provided instructions. Definitely recommend!

name: Morgan Moore
text: Pick up and drop off went well! Very nice gentleman! And the kids loved the moon walk! Will definitely be using them again in the future!

name: Kenyona Johnson
text: Great people and customer service.  They helped me load and unload.  They have weekend rentals to meet your need instead of an hourly rate or daily rate.

name: Caitlin Bonner
text: Super nice owner! Super easy to reserve, pickup, setup, and return. No hassle of any kind. We will definitely use them again!!

name: Patrick Ridgway
text: Great quality equipment and very helpful. They loaded and unloaded everything and made sure that I was comfortable putting the equipment into use.

name: Sarah Shepherd
text: The equipment we rented was absolutely perfect, and customer service was wonderful! They helped to make our little boy’s birthday party so much fun for the kids!

name: Don Shirk
text: Excellent service. Best rates around. Great guys. Highly recommend 205 Party for your next event.

name: Ericka Harden
text: Great value for short notice need of an inflatable for a birthday party. Would recommend this company if you have any need for an inflatable or other items for social events.

name: Dottie Abrams
text: My kids loved having it all weekend and I definitely got my money’s worth. It is reasonable. And worth it. I will definitely use them again.

name: Sarah Shepherd
text: The equipment we rented was absolutely perfect, and customer service was wonderful! They helped to make our little boy’s birthday party so much fun for the kids!

name: Stephanie Mcentyre
text: Great prices and service. Picking up your bounce house is the way to go to save money. We will be using again.

name: Pamela Trucks
text: They are super nice prices are very reasonable and the kids always love it have gotten four bouncy houses now and will definitely be back to get more

name: Jeffery Hall, Jr
text: These guys are awesome!! Friendly. Courteous. Helpful. I'll definitely be back and recommend others. 👍

name: Molly Hatcher
text: Pick up your Party is an exceptional rental experience. We have used them multiple times for personal and church events. They are extremely nice and professional. We will continue to use them for all future events as well.

name: james nelson
text: Good price. Easy to pick up and drop off. Good people. Will be using again.

name: Janet Parker Williams
text: Was very pleased with our BIG AL bouncy house. Pick up and return was absolutely great! Will definitely rent again!

name: Brittany Smith
text: We rented the looney toon palace for my 3 year old birthday & it was a blast! The prices are great & service is absolutely wonderful! I’ll definitely be renting from them again!! Thank you for the wonderful experience!!

name: Tamia Willis
text: Great option and no rush to return since you get to keep for full weekend.

name: james nelson
text: Good price. Easy to pick up and drop off. Good people. Will be using again.

name: Janet Parker Williams
text: Was very pleased with our BIG AL bouncy house. Pick up and return was absolutely great! Will definitely rent again!

name: Ashly Abrams A
text: Good prices,  and easy to reserve online. We rented a Toddler indoor/outdoor Bounce House, tables, and chairs from the Pelham location. Will use again. Highly recommended:-)

name: Bethany Osbourn
text: My order cancelled.  I did not request a cancellation.  I found out the night before pick up that it had been cancelled.  I was able to find another rental, however the one I originally had chosen was no longer available. I will not be using 205PartyRentals again.

name: Amy Johnson
text: The pick up and drop off time frames are too limited. Things come up and you cant be there and there isnt flexibility for that same day. Otherwise, everything with the bounce house was perfect!

name: Beth Lundberg
text: I messed up when I ordered a bouncy house for my kids birthday. I told my husband the wrong time and didn't confirm the reservation. The guy met up with my husband anyways. He saved the day! Will definitely use them again next year!

name: Jamie Martin
text: I rented a bounce house for my daughters 2nd Birthday. I had to cancel the original date rented and received a rain check. When I rescheduled the date I spoke with an incredibly kind and helpful lady, I’m sorry I don’t remember her name. I had to go to the Trussville location for pick up..which was a bit inconvenient, but I was I able to return it to the Pelham location. I had no problems getting it out of my SUV, unrolled and put up, on my own. I will definitely be using them in the future for parties!!

name: katie gilbert
text: Very affordable and great choices! Easy pick up and drop off! Will continue to use them for every event!

name: Patrick Russo
text: Reliable service. Could be more convenient pickup location, but worked out well.

name: Brent Girardeau
text: Perfect experience. Great service, clear expectations, very good price.

name: Lisa Temple
text: awesome experience.  It was an easy pick up and drop off

name: Jessica Amick
text: Awesome customer service and great prices. Wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Tieasha Abdur-Rasheed
text: Excellent customer service! I will definitely book again!!

name: Kayla Moore
text: Loved our moonwalk that we rented! The owner is extremely nice and the quality of his products are great

name: Shea Poole
text: I paid $300 to rent a bouncy house for my sons 5th birthday party, this was going to be his very first real birthday party with friends from school invited, but it rained the day before and completely flooded the entire park where we were supposed to have our party so needless to say we could no longer have the party much less use a bouncy house that requires electricity when the ground is under 5in of water where a bunch of 4yr olds would be playing!!! I spent the next several hours trying to get in touch with the company to let them know and to ask about a rain check(which EVERY OTHER COMPANY GIVES) and I am told no but that I could get a 25% discount on another rental and that was only after being at a complete loss for words!! I paid $300 to pick up a bouncy house that never left the back of my truck because the entire Leeds area was flooded the day before!! I will NEVER rent from this sorry place again! And I was given the excuse of someone had to be there for me to pick up my rental so they couldn’t give me money back or a rain check!! It cost $300 to have some there! They had no fork lift to help load this VERY heavy thing into my truck so if my dad had not been there to help I wouldn’t have even been able to take it home when I got there!!! So now I’m out $300 and will have to spend another $300 or $400 to rent from another company for when we reschedule my sons party since this place expected me to use it in standing water! NEVER again will I rent from this company

name: Quantina McCarter
text: Great customer service! Great bounce house! You have my full business! Thanks guys!

name: Dionna Phillips
text: Great & Awesome Company!Outstanding Price will be back soon

name: cynthia thomas
text: Excellent service very friendly helpful and most of all the Prices are affordable they have all you need for your kids and adults events.Thank you for your service will be back

name: Haley Mcnutt
text: Great People & Customer Service, alot of variety to choose from. Will definitely use them again!

name: LaToya Blake
text: Rentals are inexpensive and the workers there are super nice, personable, and professional

name: Mila Gularte
text: The services were excellent and price was very reasonable! I’ll be renting again from Pick Up Your Party in the near future!

name: Heather de la Piedra
text: Great experience,  very easy process to order online and convenient!

name: Chris Kniseley
text: Great people with great prices! My second time to rent with them, won't be my last.

name: Ann Thomas
text: Easy to work with and fabulous deal!  Will def rent from again.

name: coedy cash
text: Friendly staff and great price!! We will be using them again!!

name: Courtney Dagenhart
text: Easy pick up and great customer service

name: Megan Isbell
text: Good prices and very nice to work with! Will rent from them again.

name: Renarda Archie
text: Amazing service, quick and easy process!

name: Breanna Fogg
text: Great experience!

name: Paige Price
text: Easy to work with and great service!

name: Sarah Hicks
text: Excellent Service, Convenient Location, Friendly Staff!

name: L. Adams
text: Service was great

name: David Faught
text: They are the best!

name: alisha goodwin
text: Awesome place, great people!

name: Jared Echols
text: Great people to deal with.

name: Katelynn Corder-Grier
text:
Update: we just used them for the second year running for birthday parties and everything was just as awesome this summer. The pick-up/drop-off process was easy. They are all super friendly. The inflatables were in good conditions and very easy to set up (less easy to expertly fold back up into the minivan, but we knew what we were getting into ;) ). My kids love having them for the whole weekend and the price was perfect and as advertised with no hidden fees at checkout. I absolutely recommend them!
-------
We were beyond satisfied with their service. We rented a bounce house for our kids' birthdays over a weekend to make up for their big party being cancelled. The kids were thrilled!!! Their service was excellent. Their staff is very friendly and helpful. The inflatable was clean and high quality. While shopping around for rentals, we found a lot of companies to have hidden fees that show up at checkout (set up and delivery, mostly) which doubled the cost in many cases. Here you will need two able bodied adults on your end to set up and break down for transportation back, but that is clear from their website and you save a lot of money. We will definitely be using them in the future for any future parties!

resp.text: Thank you. Mrs.Corder-Grier for the five star review.  We are glad that we were able to accommodate  you kid's birthdays.

name: Steven Ogran
text: First-time customer and it was super easy and fun!  Ordered a wet/dry bounce house/slide combo for our daughter.  These inflatables are HEAVY.  Me and another dad were able to drag it around but it takes a lot of effort, so know that.  Unloading/loading into your vehicle requires multiple people.  Aside from that the kids had a BLAST!  We used our water hose with a sprayer that Velcro's on top of the slide and it worked very well.  Pick-up and drop-off were a breeze, will definitely use again!

name: Divonne Clayton
text: We definitely would recommend to anyone.  The staff was so friendly and helpful. The price was great and for the entire weekend.  I can't wait until our next event.

name: Latosha Moore
text: Rental was good other than slide coming detached and we couldn't move it back to reattach it because the water all over it made it to where we couldn't move it back, so we only got to play on one slide. The ice machine was ok, ice shavings went everywhere instead of one particular area and the 2 guys moved the ice machine from where we had placed it and luckily my mother seen it or else my brother would've ran it over the next morning heading to work.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review and we are so sorry about the problems you mentioned. We will be in touch shortly with you.

name: Katie Anderton
text: You get plenty of hours for your money. Delivery, set up, and take down was on time. My kids love the slides!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We truly appreciate your kind words!

name: Brandon Reeves
text: Showed up on time for delivery and pickup. Very courteous. The kids enjoyed every minute of it.  We will use them again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate it!

name: Ashley Walker
text: Showed up early for set up. All of the kids enjoyed it!

resp.text: Thank you for the review

name: Donna Young
text: I have rented from Just Add Kidz three times. Every single experience has been a great one. I would highly recommend them! Great customer service!!!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Mrs Young!

name: Amber Ellis
text: Wonderful experience!  They stayed in contact throughout the whole process. The kids had a blast! Thank you Just Add Kidz! We will definitely be renting again!

resp.text: Thank you for for the review!

name: Deborah Brown
text: I would use them again, they will do whatever it takes to satisfy the customer.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the good review!

name: Christina Standefer
text: Love this place if u havent booked with them U should they are sweet friendly people the people I booked with on the phone and the guys that came out to my house to set it up for me they are very friendly and nice and go out of the way to help u. I have recommend this place to all my friends and family and all my neighbors that asked where did u rent that...

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words Christina! 😁
